title: Autumn Glam Gala
description: Get ready to light up the season with Autumn Glam Gala, a beauty makeup game, the ultimate fashion and makeup experience! Transform three besties into autumn-style icons for the gala of the year. Immerse yourself in a world of beauty, where every choice—whether it’s soft, earthy tones or bold, golden sparkles—captures the magic of fall. Mix and match an array of luxurious makeup shades, chic hairstyles, and dazzling outfits to craft show-stopping looks. Embrace the season’s hottest trends, flex your makeup artist skills, and watch your creations shine under the gala lights.
